en.title: Skill Set
en.description: Exploring the diverse range of skills I've acquired and developed:

en.title: Design Principles
en.description: Highly skilled at crafting visually appealing designs using fundamental principles of color theory, typography, layout composition, and balance to captivate viewers and convey messages effectively.

en.title: Responsive Layouts
en.description: Proficient in crafting adaptable layouts for diverse devices, ensuring optimal user experience by seamlessly adjusting design elements and content to different screen sizes.

en.title: Usability Testing
en.description: Enhancing user experiences through comprehensive usability testing, ensuring optimal functionality and user satisfaction.

en.title: Wireframing
en.description: Skilled in creating detailed wireframes to visualize and plan user interfaces, effectively laying the foundation for intuitive design.

en.title: Interaction Design
en.description: Proficient in creating intuitive and seamless interactions for user-friendly experiences, harmonizing aesthetics and usability.

en.title: Prototyping
en.description: Skilled in translating concepts into interactive prototypes for testing and refinement, ensuring functional and engaging end products.
